author: The B1M
description:
When it comes to torturous mega builds, Toronto's Eglinton Crosstown line is a classic of the genre.
For more by The B1M subscribe now - https://bit.ly/the-b1m

Full story here: https://theb1m.com/video/why-canada-desperately-needs-this-13bn-railway

Additional footage and images courtesy of Transitthinker, CTV News, CityNews, Doly Begum, Virgin Radio Toronto, Rob Oliphant, Toronto Sun, CBC News, Global News, The Canadian Press, CP24, Jortsmaster5000 / CC BY-SA 4.0.

00:00 - Intro
1:13 - Building Eglinton Crosstown
3:10 - Delays upon delays
3:48 - Why Toronto needs this
8:03 - How did we get here?
8:55 - Errors and delays
13:04 - What next?

We're raising awareness of construction's mental health crisis through our Get Construction Talking initiative. There’s a video series on our channel and you can find support or donate at - https://www.getconstructiontalking.org/
